name: Mini Piano
description:
As a creative Musician my dream was build a Piano in software, i made something the past years in Microsoft Basic and Applesoft and Sinclair Basic, but this is the most beautiful development i have made. It is really simple also for the youngest and has nice sounds found on public domain (Thank you!).

In the second version i have add the accompaniment inserting before starting the App a  Music CDROM.
